EmailTemplate.name: Disqualified - Referral to Partner
EmailTemplate.subject: Collective may not be a fit - but we're still here for you!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Opportunity.First_Name__c},
It was a pleasure speaking with you, and I enjoyed hearing about your business.
While Collective wouldn't be able to service you, I would still like to provide you with some referrals. Below you'll find a couple of companies we've heard some good things about:
Taxfyle.com - Formation and tax filing services - and you even get preferred pricing as a Collective referral! Bench.co - Bookkeeping services designed for small businesses
Know someone in your network who would benefit from Collective's services? Take 30 seconds and join our referral program and share the word! If you refer someone and they become a member, you'll get $400, and they'll get one month at 50% off. NO CAP ON PAYOUTS!
Best, {!User.Name}
